Uses of Class
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock.AeLockRequest

Packages that use AeLockRequest
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock Locking facility used to control access to variables when there are serializable scopes in the process.  
 

Uses of AeLockRequest in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock
 

Subclasses of AeLockRequest in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock
(package private)  class AeExclusiveLockRequest
          Extension of the base lock request that will only acquire the lock if it's the only lock holder present.
(package private)  class AeSharedLockRequest
          A request for a shared lock on a variable.
 

Methods in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock with parameters of type AeLockRequest
(package private)  void AeVariableLocker.addLockRequest(java.lang.String aOwnerPath, AeLockRequest aLockRequest)
          Adds a lock request to the set of lock requests to retry.
private  void AeLockerSerializer.serializeLockRequest(AeLockRequest aLockRequest, org.w3c.dom.Element aRequests)
          Serializes a lock request.
